mapper.select: SELECT TIMESTAMP,OID,CID,PRICE,QUANT,STATUS FROM pns.orders a WHERE a.PNSOID=#{pnsoid} AND a.POID=#{poid} AND a.SIDE=#{side} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} AND a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.STATUS in ('DEALING','PAID','PAYCONFIRM','CANCELLED','DONE','REJECT_LOCK','REJECT_DONE','ERROR','UNKNOWN') ORDER BY a.TIMESTAMP ASC LIMIT #{num}, 10;

SELECT TIMESTAMP,OID,CID,PRICE,QUANT,STATUS FROM pns.orders a WHERE a.OID=#{oid} AND a.CID=#{cid} AND a.PNSOID=#{pnsoid} AND a.POID=#{poid} AND a.SIDE=#{side} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} AND a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.STATUS in ('DEALING','PAID','PAYCONFIRM','CANCELLED','DONE','REJECT_LOCK','REJECT_DONE','ERROR','UNKNOWN')
SELECT TIMESTAMP,OID,SIDE,SIDE,PRICE,QUANT,STATUS FROM pns.orders a WHERE a.CID=#{cid} AND a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} ORDER BY a.TimeSTAMP ASC LIMIT #{num}, 10;
